name: Mr. Block
description:
Mr's Block is a challenging game.
You need to color the same color of the Block on the box, it looks easy, is not that simple.
As you progress through the levels, you will encounter a time tunnel, cloning gas, need to be flexible to be able to use them to achieve higher levels.

FEATURES:
- Featuring over 36 awesome levels
- time tunnel, cloning gas, and other elements
- Block of different colors
- Reduce the number of moves to get more stars
- And more fun ..
